definition: to fall into disuse (of laws, customs etc)/to neglect
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
to unstring a bow/to slacken/to relax/to loosen

sentences.english: The ethics of the legal profession, in those days, were somewhat lax.
sentences.chinese: 在那年代，法律界的道德有些廢弛墮落。

sentences.english: Then she lets her shoulders relax, picks up the dice.
sentences.chinese: 然後，她的肩膀廢弛下來，拿起了骰子。
